tasks.label: Start Addon
tasks.command: ha addons start "local_${input:addonName}" && sleep 2 && docker logs --follow "addon_local_${input:addonName}"

tasks.label: Restart Addon
tasks.command: ha addons restart "local_${input:addonName}" && sleep 2 && docker logs --follow "addon_local_${input:addonName}"

tasks.label: Rebuild Addon
tasks.command: bash ${workspaceFolder}/.devcontainer/poststart.sh && (ha addons info "local_${input:addonName}" 2>&1 | grep -q 'version: ' || ha addons install "local_${input:addonName}") && (ha addons rebuild "local_${input:addonName}" 2>&1 || ha addons update "local_${input:addonName}")

tasks.label: Rebuild and Start Addon
tasks.command: bash ${workspaceFolder}/.devcontainer/poststart.sh && (ha addons info "local_${input:addonName}" 2>&1 | grep -q 'version: ' || ha addons install "local_${input:addonName}") && (ha addons rebuild "local_${input:addonName}" 2>&1 || ha addons update "local_${input:addonName}") && ha addons start "local_${input:addonName}" && sleep 2 && docker logs --follow "addon_local_${input:addonName}"

tasks.label: Full Development Reload
tasks.command: echo 'ğŸ”„ Starting full development reload...' && (ha addons uninstall "local_${input:addonName}" 2>/dev/null || echo '   â„¹ï¸  Addon not installed') && echo 'ğŸ”„ Reloading addon repository...' && bash ${workspaceFolder}/.devcontainer/poststart.sh && echo 'ğŸ“¦ Installing addon...' && ha addons install "local_${input:addonName}" && echo 'âœ… Full reload complete!'

inputs.description: Name of addon (to add your addon to this list, please edit .vscode/tasks.json)
